title: Connect Colab to Hugging Face Spaces
steps: Export your trained model from Colab as a .pkl file.
Upload the model to Hugging Face Spaces.
Configure the app interface in Spaces.
Test the deployment and share the link.
pitfalls: Model file size limits may apply.

title: Deploy Lovable App on Vercel
steps: Export your Lovable project as a static site.
Connect your GitHub repo to Vercel.
Import the project in Vercel dashboard.
Click deploy and get your live link.
pitfalls: Static export may not support all Lovable features.

title: Automate Bubble CRM with Zapier
steps: Set up Bubble CRM app.
Create Zapier workflow for new contacts.
Sync data between Bubble and other services.
pitfalls: API limits may affect sync speed.

title: Send Glide App Data to Google Colab
steps: Export Glide app data as CSV.
Upload CSV to Colab for analysis.
Visualize results in Colab notebook.

title: Integrate Power Apps with Zapier
steps: Create Power Apps form.
Set up Zapier to trigger on new submissions.
Automate notifications or data entry.

title: Embed Spaces App in Bubble Site
steps: Copy Spaces app embed code.
Paste into Bubble site HTML.
Deploy and view embedded app.

title: Sync Lovable Data to Peltarion
steps: Export Lovable data as JSON.
Upload to Peltarion for model training.
Deploy results in Peltarion pipeline.

title: Deploy Appgyver App to Vercel
steps: Export Appgyver app as web build.
Upload to Vercel for hosting.
Share public link.

title: Automate Model Retraining with Colab and Spaces
steps: Schedule Colab notebook to retrain model.
Push updated model to Spaces.

title: Connect Power Apps to Bubble for HR
steps: Create employee form in Power Apps.
Sync data to Bubble directory.
Enable search and updates in Bubble.
